metadata.title: CVE-2016-10700 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
auth_login.php in Cacti before 1.0.0 allows remote authenticated users whouse web authentication to bypass intended access restrictions by logging inas a user not in the cacti database, because the guest user is notconsidered. NOTE: this vulnerability exists because of an incomplete fixfor CVE-2016-2313.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-10700` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

cacti - 0.8.8f+ds1-4ubuntu4.16.04.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: cacti package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.8.8f+ds1-4ubuntu4.16.04.2').
